texte.text: VIDEO GAME WORLD

UPIXO HEADQUARTERS
(UNITED PIXELHEROES ORGANISATION)
WHAAAAAAT?!?!

WHAT DO YOU MEAN, 'EL PIX HAS ENTERED THE SECRET
TELEPORT STATION'?!

IT GETS WORSE. HE USED IT TO TELEPORT TO HUMAN
WORLD!

SAY AGAIN? WHAT COULD HE POSSIBLY WANT FROM
THERE?

WE FOUND OUT THAT HE STOLE SOME IMPORTANT GAME
FILES FROM A LABORATORY!
THE SECURTITY CAMERAS CAPTURED EVERYTHING.
JOB AGENCY
TO THE CONTROL CENTRE
MEANWHILE, ONE FLOOR BELOW...
HEY THERE, CHUBBY! WHY THE LONG FACE?

OH LINDA, MY CAREER IS SUCH A MESS! THEY NEVER
CAST ME IN A ROLE THAT SUITS ME.

I MEAN, TAKE A LOOK. HERE THE LEVEL DESIGNER STUCK
ME BEHIND A TREE.

AND HERE THE GRAPHICS DESIGNER WAS TRYING TO BE
FUNNY, I SUPPOSE.

AND IN MY LAST GAME THEY CAST ME IN A DESERT
LEVEL! THAT'S NOT COOL IF YOU'RE A SNOWMAN!

THIS IS LAST NIGHT'S FOOTAGE FROM THE TELEPORT
STATION.
HERE COMES EL PIX!
HUMAN WORLD
AMBROSIA
POLYGON PLACE
MILKY WAY
THERE HE GOES, TELEPORTING TO HUMAN WORLD.

AND THERE HE IS AGAIN, WITH THE GAME FILES HE WAS
LOOKING FOR.

THE NERVE OF THAT GUY! NO DOUBT THIS IS ANOTHER
ONE OF HIS EVIL SCHEMES TO TAKE OVER VIDEO GAME WORLD!

YES... EVER SINCE HE LOST SOME OF HIS PIXELS, HIS
IDEAS HAVE BECOME CRAZIER AND CRAZIER...

CHEER UP, CHUBBY. WHY DON'T YOU TAKE A SEAT AND
FILL OUT THIS FORM, EH?

I'M SURE WE'LL BE ABLE TO FIND SOMETHING THAT
SUITS YOUR TALENTS BEFORE YOU KNOW IT.

THIS IS A DISASTER FOR VIDEO GAME WORLD!
WHERE CAN WE FIND EL PIX?

HE APPEARS TO HAVE RETREATED TO HIS REALM...
IN SNOWDRIFTLAND!

WE NEED TO MAKE SURE THAT THE STOLEN GOODS ARE
RETURNED AS SOON AS POSSIBLE.

PUT A SPECIAL TEAM TOGETHER AND SEND IN OUR BEST
MAN, PRONTO!
I'M AFRAID IT'S NOT GOING TO BE THAT SIMPLE, BOSS.
WHY NOT?

SNOWDRIFTLAND IS LOCATED IN THE COLDEST CORNER OF
VIDEO GAME WORLD.

IT WOULD TAKE SOMEONE WITH AN EXTREME TOLERANCE
TO LOW TEMPERATURES TO TACKLE SUCH A CHILLING
MISSION.
THERE MUST BE SOMEONE...
CONTINUE
SKIP INTRO
